meanings.definition: A person who seeks attention by showing off their talents or accomplishments.
meanings.sent1: The showboaters at the talent show impressed everyone with their skills.
meanings.sent2: The group of showboaters constantly tried to outshine each other on stage.
meanings.sent3: The showboaters in the school play made sure all eyes were on them.
meanings.sent4: The showboaters in the music industry always steal the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The showboaters in the circus amazed the audience with their daring acts.

meanings.sent1: After the performance, the showboaters took a bow together.
meanings.sent2: The showboaters gathered backstage to celebrate their successful show.
meanings.sent3: The showboaters in the group photo posed with big smiles.
meanings.sent4: The showboaters' costumes were the most colorful on stage.
meanings.sent5: The showboaters' enthusiasm was contagious among the audience.
